de.wirecard.epos.util

Class TaxUtils

  • de.wirecard.epos.util.TaxUtils

  • public class TaxUtils

    TaxUtils is a helper class, providing static methods to help you calculate gross/nett amounts, tax amounts for single items and list of items. Tips and Service charge are dealt with appropriately.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.math.BigDecimal calculateNettAmount()
      calculates the tax amount for given amount and tax rate. Allows to calculate in both modes (tax included - gross, tax not included - nett).
      static java.math.BigDecimal calculateServiceChargeOrTipNettAmount()
      Calculate Net Service charge amount from Gross Service charge. Same calculation for tip
      static java.math.BigDecimal calculateTaxAmount()
      calculates the tax amount for given amount and tax rate. Allows to calculate in both modes (tax included - gross, tax not included - nett).
      static java.math.BigDecimal calculateTotalAmountOfItem()
      calculates total amount of price by multiplying the unitPrice with the quantity and rounding half up to scale decimal places.
      static java.math.BigDecimal convertTaxRateInPercentsToDecimalForm()
      converts tax rate represented in percents to factor representation by dividing the percentage number by 100. ET171025 TODO where is it specified that only up to two decimal palces are allowed. Add reference here
      static java.util.Map<java.math.BigDecimal,java.util.List> getTaxMap()
      sorts all given sales items into lists for each tax rate found.
      static java.util.List<de.wirecard.epos.model.tax.TaxSection> getTaxSections()
      calculates the total amount, nett amount and tax amount for each tax rate found in the sale object.
      static java.util.List<de.wirecard.epos.model.tax.TaxSection> getTaxSections()
      calculates the total amount, nett amount and tax amount for each tax rate found in the given list of sales items.
      static java.math.BigDecimal getTipWithoutTax()
      calculates tip without tax (nett tip).

    • Method Detail

      • calculateTotalAmountOfItem

        public static java.math.BigDecimal calculateTotalAmountOfItem()

        calculates total amount of price by multiplying the unitPrice with the quantity and rounding half up to scale decimal places.

        Returns:
        total amount for items

      • calculateTaxAmount

        public static java.math.BigDecimal calculateTaxAmount()

        calculates the tax amount for given amount and tax rate. Allows to calculate in both modes (tax included - gross, tax not included - nett).

        Returns:
        tax amount

      • calculateNettAmount

        public static java.math.BigDecimal calculateNettAmount()

        calculates the tax amount for given amount and tax rate. Allows to calculate in both modes (tax included - gross, tax not included - nett).

        Returns:
        nett amount

      • calculateServiceChargeOrTipNettAmount

        public static java.math.BigDecimal calculateServiceChargeOrTipNettAmount()

        Calculate Net Service charge amount from Gross Service charge. Same calculation for tip

        Returns:

      • convertTaxRateInPercentsToDecimalForm

        public static java.math.BigDecimal convertTaxRateInPercentsToDecimalForm()

        converts tax rate represented in percents to factor representation by dividing the percentage number by 100. ET171025 TODO where is it specified that only up to two decimal palces are allowed. Add reference here

        Returns:
        tax rate represented in decimal form (e.g. 0.1755 for 17.55%)

      • getTipWithoutTax

        public static java.math.BigDecimal getTipWithoutTax()

        calculates tip without tax (nett tip).

        Returns:
        nett tip

      • getTaxMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.math.BigDecimal,java.util.List> getTaxMap()

        sorts all given sales items into lists for each tax rate found.

        Returns:
        map with tax rates found as keys. Each entry contains the list of sales items for the related tax rate

      • getTaxSections

        public static java.util.List<de.wirecard.epos.model.tax.TaxSection> getTaxSections()

        calculates the total amount, nett amount and tax amount for each tax rate found in the sale object.

        Returns:
        list of tax sections (containing the calculated values) for each tax rate found

      • getTaxSections

        public static java.util.List<de.wirecard.epos.model.tax.TaxSection> getTaxSections()

        calculates the total amount, nett amount and tax amount for each tax rate found in the given list of sales items.

        Returns:
        list of tax sections (containing the calculated values) for each tax rate found
